name: The Window
description:
A tribute to John Karel aka jjjjjohn.
John's window used to be a stage for exhibits, now it has become the exhibit itself. And you can touch it!

Click with the mouse on a tile in the windowsill to activate or deactivate it.
Toggle sequencer playback with [space bar].
Toggle rotation with [return key].
Click anywhere with the mouse to toggle between camera front view and sequencer view.
